SageTVPlugin.Name: Multispeed Skip
SageTVPlugin.Description: With this plugin, the FF/REW buttons in the full-screen video page become more like VCR FF/REW buttons, giving continuous FF/REW functionality, with speeds varying from 2x to 128x.
SageTVPlugin.Author: nielm, JREkiwi
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
1.6.1.2 Change download to GitHub 1.6.1.1 Change download to HTTPS
1.6.1 Fix sizing and location of speed indicator Fix conflict with Multi Function Stop plugin 1.6 Port of nielm's Multispeed_Skip import
